resources.string: Welcome to Virtual Penguin, Team Ramrod\'s version of Bandai\'s handheld Tamagotchi device. The goal is to keep your penguin alive for as long as possible. Be careful, as conditions for a lone penguin are harsh!

Developers 
 Elliott Ewing (Manager/Programmer) 
 Jeremy Lipps (Programmer) 
 Dylan Ruggeroli (Programmer) 
 Operations & Testing 
 Taylor Oyama (Documentation/Art) 
 Eric Aranda (Tester)
